Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; MOUNTED
Name: Cup with Semicircular Design
Description: This finely decorated and polished red cup features an interesting design. The decoration, which encircles the upper part of the cup, consists of a simple repetitive pattern of semicircles. The semicircular patterns are separated by relatively broad vertical lines. The outlines are drawn in black and the space between them is painted white.
